attributes.action: reject proposals to axe the Brighton - Manchester train
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The holder of the Crosscountry franchise, Arriva, has decided to axe the service to Manchester from Brighton, which is a needed link from the North to the South. Please sign the petition to put a halt to these plans, as this would mean a journey across London for those who frequently use the service.
